description:
**Problem**
REALTIME_PLAN §13.2/§13.4 call for incremental checkpoint export: track dirty shards per namespace and reuse previous checkpoint blobs for unchanged shards. Current `build_snapshot` in `src/git/checkpoint/export.rs` sets `dirty_shards = all shards`, and `GitWorker::publish_checkpoint` always calls `export_checkpoint(previous=None)`, so every checkpoint is a full re‑export with no reuse.

**Design**
- Track dirty shard IDs in `StoreRuntime` using `ApplyOutcome` (beads/tombstones/deps) and pass them into `CheckpointSnapshot` instead of defaulting to all.
- Retain the last export per group (or load from cache) and pass `previous: Some(&export)` to `export_checkpoint` so unchanged shard files are reused.
- Ensure dirty shards are cleared only after successful publish.

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Dirty shards are tracked per namespace and carried into checkpoint snapshots.
- [ ] `export_checkpoint` reuses previous files for clean shards.
- [ ] Checkpoint export tests cover dirty‑only updates and reuse behavior.

**Files:** src/daemon/store_runtime.rs, src/daemon/core.rs, src/daemon/checkpoint_scheduler.rs, src/daemon/git_worker.rs, src/git/checkpoint/export.rs
title: Checkpoint export always full; dirty shard tracking + previous reuse missing

description:
**Problem**
REALTIME_ERRORS.md defines overloaded, rate_limited, and maintenance_mode, but OpError has no variants and IPC cannot emit these codes. Limits exist but no visible error signaling.

**Where**
- src/core/error.rs: ErrorCode::{Overloaded,RateLimited,MaintenanceMode}
- src/daemon/ops.rs: OpError missing variants
- src/core/limits.rs: admission/backpressure limits

**Design**
- Add OpError variants and IPC mappings for overloaded/rate_limited/maintenance_mode with retry_after_ms when available.
- Hook AdmissionController/maintenance mode checks to return these errors on request admission.

**Acceptance**
- Overload and maintenance mode conditions emit the corresponding realtime error codes.
- retry_after_ms is set when known.

**Files**
- src/daemon/ops.rs
- src/daemon/ipc.rs
- src/daemon/* admission path (as implemented in bd-3m5.29)
title: Admission/backpressure: emit overloaded/rate_limited/maintenance_mode
